duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical support in the area of overlay, diffusion aluminide, and other coating technologies for gas turbine applications.
Interact with Solar's supply chain, manufacturing, design engineering, and customer service organizations.
Select coatings, source and qualify external suppliers, manage coatings property database, and prepare engineering and manufacturing specifications.
Utilize extensive metallurgical engineering experience in thermal barrier and/or oxidation/hot corrosion resistant coatings for industrial gas turbine applications.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Materials Engineering or equivalent (Master’s preferred)
